alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 26 at 9:17PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Lithia affecting Hillsborough County. .Alafia River At Lithia is expected to reach minor stage flood in the next days. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alafia River At Lithia . * WHEN...From Wednesday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Additional residences downstream of County Road 640 bridge begin flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 15.8 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.9 feet on 07/09/1939. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Alafia River Lithia 13.0 8.6 Mon 8 pm 11.7 14.3 15.8 15.2 13.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 1215 PM EDT.
